      • Node

        public Node​(double x,
            double y,
            int numberOfConnectingEdges,
            int id)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        x - : Node center x-coordinate
        y - : Node center y-coordinate
        numberOfConnectingEdges - : Number of edges connected to this node at the time of initialization
        id - : The node ID corresponding to the current number of nodes in the game + 1
